Uses of Package
org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets

  • Packages that use org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets 
    Package Description
    org.apache.flex.compiler.clients
    This package contains classes implementing four compiler command-line tools: MXMLC, COMPC, ASC, and Optimizer.
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.embedding.transcoders  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.graph  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects
    This package is the internal counterpart of the external org.apache.flex.compiler.projects package.
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets
    This package is the internal counterpart of the external org.apache.flex.compiler.targets package.
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.as
    This package is the internal counterpart of the external org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.as package.
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.mxml
    This package is the internal counterpart of the external org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.mxml package.
    org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.as  
    org.apache.flex.swc
    This package and its subpackages contain a support library for reading, writing, and representing SWC files.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets used by org.apache.flex.compiler.clients 
    Class and Description
    AppSWFTarget
    Sub-class of SWFTarget that builds a SWF that is meant to be loaded by the flash player ( as opposed to a library.swf in a SWC ).
    SWFTarget
    Concrete implementation of ITarget for building a collection of source files into a SWF.
    Target
    Abstract base class to help subclasses implement ITarget.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.embedding.transcoders 
    Class and Description
    FlexFontInfo
    Utility class to store font information obtained from the font transcoder
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.graph 
    Class and Description
    LinkageChecker
    Class to handle all of the checks for external linkage.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects 
    Class and Description
    Target
    Abstract base class to help subclasses implement ITarget.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets 
    Class and Description
    AppSWFTarget
    Sub-class of SWFTarget that builds a SWF that is meant to be loaded by the flash player ( as opposed to a library.swf in a SWC ).
    ILibrarySWFTarget
    Interface for library swf targets.
    ITargetAttributes
    Attributes that changes the target output, such as "frame rate", "SWF width" and "Use GPU".
    LibrarySWFTarget
    Class to build a library.swf for a SWC.
    LinkageChecker
    Class to handle all of the checks for external linkage.
    NilTargetAttributes
    Nil implementation of ITargetAttributes.
    SWFTarget
    Concrete implementation of ITarget for building a collection of source files into a SWF.
    SWFTarget.FramesInformation
    Contains information about the skeleton of a SWF that is being built by a SWFTarget and provides methods to create SWFFrames and add them to a ISWF.
    SWFTarget.SWFFrameInfo 
    Target
    Abstract base class to help subclasses implement ITarget.
    Target.BuiltCompilationUnitSet
    Wad that holds a set of ICompilationUnits that have been built to build the output of this target and any ICompilerProblems found building those ICompilationUnits.
    Target.DirectDependencies
    Wad containing an Iterable of ICompilationUnits and an Iterable of ICompilerProblems found while constructing the Iterable of ICompilationUnits.
    Target.RootedCompilationUnits
    Wad containing the set of ICompilationUnits that root the dependency walk and any ICompilerProblems encountered computing the roots of the dependency walk.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.as 
    Class and Description
    ITargetAttributes
    Attributes that changes the target output, such as "frame rate", "SWF width" and "Use GPU".
